text: Reasons why hugs are great and beneficial    Makes you feel better  Makes your depression go away  Makes you feel more confident  Makes you feel like you belong   Makes you feel like you are understood  Makes a core memory that will last for years  You feel like you are able to do anything you can put your mind too  Makes your insides feel all warm and gooey  Makes you feel like you are able to face the negativity of the world  Makes you feel ready to ask your crush out  btw your crush may be the person giving you a hug  Makes you have a better understanding of your emotions  Makes you have a better outlook on life   Makes you want to go do something   Makes you want to take care of yourself  Makes you want to take care of the place that you stay  Makes you want to act better around people  Makes you want to treat others better   Makes you want to give other people hugs  Makes you not want to give up on trying again  Makes you believe in yourself  https m youtube com watch v dQw w WgXcQ  Skip a few  Allows you to feel compassion for other people  Allows you to have a better way to express empathy and just a better understanding of empathy Disclaimer  this is just some of the few reasons  opinions I can think of for why hugs are good  if you have anymore suggestions I will add them to the list and together we can actually make a list that has   reasons
summary: There are many reasons why hugs are beneficial. They make you feel better, more confident, understand your emotions, have a better outlook on life, take care of yourself, act better around people and treat others better. If you have any more suggestions, I will add them to the list.

text: I wish I could reply to you allI wish I could reply to everyone on this thread  It pains me to see the amount of other pain others are holding too As someone s whose contemplated suicide many many times  the biggest  and only problem I see with this planet  is the people   Put me on an island by myself and I ll be a happy chappy but I ain t got the money for that   It s just the ultimate recurring toxicity  pressure  cunts that make this place terrible  And it leaves us outsiders feeling fucking bad   I understand we are all going through something somewhat similar  wanting to be non existent   But then I remember the money and time my family have put into raising me and I would not be able to leave them like that   For those with no family  I pray you find a way to keep going  a way to find the other side and a light at the end of the tunnel I hope everyone feeling down today finds the strength to keep going  The people enjoying the toxicity of this planet  are the problem  we are merely in the back trying to keep going so the others don t get too upset   And that s deeply painful to go through every  Single  Day   But we ve kept going  So props to us   And those who decide to go through with what s playing on all our minds  I hope your soul has eternal rest cmon soldiers we got this
